name: mcp_search_cultural_heritage
description:
Search for cultural heritage items (artworks, artifacts, etc.) from European institutions.
    
    Args:
        query: Search term (artist name, artwork title, type, etc.)
        limit: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)
    
    Returns:
        Formatted list of cultural heritage items with details

name: mcp_get_artwork_details
description:
Get detailed information about a specific artwork or cultural item.
    
    Args:
        artwork_id: Unique identifier of the artwork
    
    Returns:
        Detailed information about the artwork including description, provenance, and technical details

name: mcp_get_collections_by_institution
description:
Get artworks and cultural items from a specific museum or cultural institution.
    
    Args:
        institution_name: Name of the cultural institution (e.g., "Louvre", "British Museum")
    
    Returns:
        List of cultural items from the specified institution

name: mcp_get_cultural_recommendations
description:
Get AI-powered recommendations for cultural heritage items based on user interests.
    
    Args:
        user_interest: User's cultural interests (e.g., "modern art", "renaissance", "impressionist")
    
    Returns:
        Personalized recommendations for cultural heritage exploration
